message.content: {"given_definition_quality":92,"better_definition":"to write down or remember","sentence":"她记东西。","image_prompt":"Soft apocalypse animation style. A young woman (她), simple modern clothes, stands writing something in a small notebook. There are everyday objects (东西) around her -- like an apple, a cup, and a book. Muted colors. The room has faint overgrown plants creeping in through a window, giving an atmospheric end-times mood, but the focus is on her writing. Soft, dreamy lighting.","sentence_translation":"She writes things down."}
